Dialogue.Page: Chert’s Research Notes — property of Chert!
This is the only known Nomai construction on Dark Bramble. It was clearly used for research of some sort but what were they studying?
Despite its material placing it as one of the newest Nomai structures I've explored, it is in extremely poor condition.
Has <Color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</Color> expanded since the time of the Nomai, putting stress on the structure?
I just spotted a supernova while taking down camp, neat!
